title: Chicken with White Wine and Garlic
ingredients: ['2 medium onions, sliced into rings', '1 head garlic - cloves separated, peeled, and sliced', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '100ml (4 fl oz) white wine', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', 'paprika to taste', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
